attributes.action: Stop the Genocides of the Hazaras in Pakistan
attributes.additional_details:
For the past few years we have been witnessing the killings of the Hazaras in Quetta, theres has been almost a thousand people killed in the past 10 years.
 the most recent of these atrocities have been the double bombings of 10/01/2013 in Quetta in which over a hundred were killed and over 300 injured.  these people are poor men and women trying to earn a living. Lashkar Jahngvi who have close links to Taliban have claimed responsibility.
we request the Foreign Office to hear our cries, condemn these attacks and to pressurise the Pakistani government to Stop these Killings.
